commit 95cb54fd41d0e952368ad6f6fda0bac144d8933a
Author: Min Qin <qinmin@chromium.org>
Date:   Wed Mar 12 15:37:03 2025 -0700

    Clean up group cache when user leaves or deletes a group
    
    When user leaves or deletes a group, the data sharing cache still
    maintains the group and is waiting for the next sync update to clean
    it. However, this may cause issues that user will not be able to
    rejoin the group. As a result, we need to clean up the cache entry
    when user leaves a group.
    
    Bug: 402233482
    Change-Id: I190af2a2352eb5630c9943237f275264391144d7
    Reviewed-on: https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/6341713
    Reviewed-by: Shakti Sahu <shaktisahu@chromium.org>
    Commit-Queue: Min Qin <qinmin@chromium.org>
    Cr-Commit-Position: refs/heads/main@{#1431791}

commit 0c88e2cdbd1a3fd6b04478505b2f0edd7de102bb
Author: Maggie Chen <magchen@chromium.org>
Date:   Wed Mar 12 15:27:53 2025 -0700

    Fix histogram GPU.Presentation.NonAnimatedOrInteractiveFrameWithPendingFrame on Mac
    
    GPU.Presentation.NonAnimatedOrInteractiveFrameWithPendingFrame is
    supposed to record whether there is a previous pending frame when we
    work on the current frame. Therefore, we should check `NumPendingSwaps()
    > 1` instead of !!NumPendingSwaps() for this recording.
    
    Change-Id: Ib1c5d5abf1108f926b67510d77af4691c2b4bdfa
    Reviewed-on: https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/6349443
    Reviewed-by: Victor Miura <vmiura@chromium.org>
    Commit-Queue: Maggie Chen <magchen@chromium.org>
    Cr-Commit-Position: refs/heads/main@{#1431785}

M	gpu/ipc/service/image_transport_surface_overlay_mac.mm
